Why Soul is the right place Catering to Gen Z a platform to share everything without judgment. Fostering empathy healing and acceptance different cultural backgrounds. A.I. empowered virtual playground to helps you make real friends near or far. You can also watch movies with your friends in the room simultaneously! Explore Explore the interest and colors through the lens of other you Learn what is happening on the opposite side of the world!
